scripts.scriptdata:
#!/static/bin/ash
#lesslinux provides wireshark #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Preparing Wireshark $normal\n" install -m 4755 /usr/bin/dumpcap /static/bin mountpoint -q /usr/bin/dumpcap || mount --bind /static/bin/dumpcap /usr/bin/dumpcap ;; stop) printf "$bold===> Removing Wireshark $normal\n" umount /usr/bin/dumpcap ;; esac
